MESSAGE: You... Must Find... The Golden Dragon...
I can feel the power coursing through me!
I see now the universe as it is!
I have achieved a higher form of being!
I AM Snubby, but I have more power now.
I need to find "The Golden Dragon," at least, some skeleton guy told me so.
Why Would I use Magic now?
Wait... If Ludwig created the universe, why can't he change it?
NO! LUDWIG IS MY FRIEND!  I WON'T LET YOU HURT HIM!
I must go, but I will leave you with a gift
CHAOSIS... IS MY MASTER... HE IS YOUR MASTER... HE IS...
I am not Ludwig... I am... Curruptwig

ntquMYr${n5I%CggNpoe.text: I put this in.  Better don't you think?  Great job on all of this!

MESSAGE: YOU LOOK LIKE MASTER SNUBBY, BUT YOU AREN'T!
If you get hurt, I can ... be a punching bag...
I will teach you to Disapear
OW! Why did you do that?! ...Well I guess i DID try to eat you...
I guess to make up by being a help to you
You cannot find The Golden Dragon...
He did leave you for that other tutle...
If only you were not such a failure...
THE MASTER could have given you incredible power...
You could have obtained more power than your "TRUE IDENTITY RAGE SNUBBY"
Even your "ULTRA SNUBBY" is weak to what you could have become...
You could have been "SPIRIT SNUBBY" almost equal in power to the master.
I will gladly help you defeat THE MASTER...
I suppose I should call him by his real name...
If I could, I would banish him back to that forsaken endless pit of FRAISTE, into the once heavenly but now infernal flames from which he was birthed...
You can't let him last in this world
even LUDWIG, who created this world...
And, for the record, I'm 1000,000 years older than Ludwig, I just made a few things...
I made you, Ludwig did the hard work,but I did the thinking.
and... maybe a little Chaosis... you see, DRAGONS out-date TUTLES, but have much less power.
We come from a different dimension, we came to this one when it was empty.
and lived in Fraiste while it was still beautiful... before it fell...
Chaosis was a creation in my world gone wrong, he destroyed our universe, and came to this one
He came as a concept, and when Ludwig made him, he took his original form...
and a Tutle form known as SPIRIT
When Fraiste fell, the Dragons went to XYCAN. Now Home of Dragons
I was exiled for creating Chaosis.
If Chaosis is destroyed... I may be able to go back to my people.
I will give you power even Ludwig would be impressed by!
He used MAGIC that only worked for that one time...
Ludwig drew power from the universe that came before this one.
He sort of... Recycled that old universe, at least, that's how I understand it.
Now... you need to fight Chaosis.
SEE YOU IN THE FUTURE! (about 2 weeks from now or so...)

QUESTION: Would you like to hear a story?

MESSAGE: I can make a final form of a physical vessel!
